chunk:
Suki Even Tone Brightening Serum

Brand: suki

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: rosa centifolia flower water , alcohol (from sugar cane denatured with lavender oil) , ascorbyl glucoside, water (aqua), tricholoma matsutake (songyi mushroom) extract, xanthan gum, alpha-arbutin, citrus limon (lemon) peel extract , glycyrrhiza glabra (licorice) root extract, lavandula angustifolia (lavender) oil , limonene*,

matsutake (songyi mushroom) extract, xanthan gum, alpha-arbutin, citrus limon (lemon) peel extract , glycyrrhiza glabra (licorice) root extract, lavandula angustifolia (lavender) oil , limonene*, linalool*.

Directions: while dewy from toner, massage 1-2 drops into the face or as a spot treatment. apply before or with suki moisturizer of choice

Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity; LOW: Cancer, Use Restrictions
